Package com.intellij.ide.projectView

Interface RootsProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFolderNode, AbstractModuleNode, AbstractMvcPsiNodeDescriptor, AbstractProjectNode, AbstractPsiBasedNode, BasePsiMemberNode, BasePsiNode, ClassNode, ClassSmartPointerNode, ClassTreeNode, CustomResourceBundlePropertiesFileNode, ExternalLibrariesNode, FieldSmartPointerNode, FileGroupingProjectNode, FileNode, FormNode, InvalidUsageNoteProjectNode, LibraryGroupNode, MethodNode, MethodSmartPointerNode, ModuleGroupNode, ModuleListNode, MvcModuleNode, MvcProjectNode, NamedLibraryElementNode, NestingTreeNode, NoteProjectNode, PackageElement, PackageElementNode, PackageViewLibrariesNode, PackageViewModuleGroupNode, PackageViewModuleNode, PackageViewProjectNode, ProjectViewModuleGroupNode, ProjectViewModuleNode, ProjectViewNode, ProjectViewNodeWithChildrenList, ProjectViewProjectNode, ProjectViewUnloadedModuleNode, PsiDirectoryNode, PsiFieldNode, PsiFileNode, PsiMethodNode, PyElementNode, PyFileNode, PyRemoteLibrariesNode, PyRemoteLibrariesNode.PyRemoteRootNode, PySkeletonsNode, PyUserSkeletonsNode, ResourceBundleNode, StructureViewModuleNode, SyntheticLibraryElementNode, TestClassNode, TestMethodNode, TestsTopLevelDirectoryNode, TodoDirNode, TodoFileNode, TodoPackageNode, TopLevelDirectoryNode, UsageProjectTreeNode

    public interface RootsProvider
    Specifies that the element corresponds to several virtual files. For example, a package may correspond to several folders in a project, or a resource bundle may correspond to several properties files.
